title: ITS UP GET READY GUYS FOR RANKED

replies.body: i was in a lobby picking my champ within 2 minutes of queing
Thats only because people in bronze stay up all night where as people in plat go to sleep

ive played at all hours of the day and havnt encountered a 25 minute que

i got 99 bronze problems but a long que aint one.
Thats because bronze queues are the shortest with the most kids on it so that they can stay up all night during holidays
